name: LifeDiving
description:
LifeDiving is a kind of infinite run game. Sections occur randomly.

After Adam fell from vulture you can controll him by touching right and left side of phone.Attention to don't let him to hit to clouds and birds also keep Adam satiated by get him to eat food

It is my first game made with unity3d for android :D

Features:

●You can move Adam by phone's acceleration or touching phone's right and left side

●Collect hamburger for buy funny hats

●Drink coke for activate force field

●Eat kebab for speed boost

●Eat pizza for increase your score

●There is day and night cycle in the game

●Game speeding up while Adam againg
